anathema: Lie, share your magic readings without payment (no matter how trivial
edict: Use magic to read the future and understand fate
markdown:
<title level="1" right="Deity " pfs="Standard">[Magdh (The Three)](/Deities.aspx?ID=457)</title>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<traits>

</traits>

**Source** [Divine Mysteries](/Sources.aspx?ID=234) pg. 306

Magdh is the Eldest of foreknowledge, complexity, and triplets, and she is the greatest seer in the [First World](/Planes.aspx?ID=35). Most often appearing as a woman with three faces set equidistantly around her head, Magdh looks across the skeins of fate into myriad alternate realities and possible futures. Among all the Eldest, she has the deepest knowledge of reality’s true design and the ripples a single action or inaction can create throughout all of existence. Her communications are veiled in conditional language and oddly juxtaposed statements to an almost infuriating degree, and thus she never communicates the prophetic truths she sees—so plain to her six eyes—in a straightforward way. Because of their shared knowledge of branching timelines, [Shyka](/Deities.aspx?ID=100) and Magdh can communicate more easily with each other about such topics, though the other Eldest are cautious around Magdh, lest a careless comment or errant gesture cause her to predict apocalyptic dooms.

<column gap="tiny">

**Category** [Eldest
](/DeityCategories.aspx?ID=7)

**Edicts** Use magic to read the future and understand fate

**Anathema** Lie, share your magic readings without payment (no matter how trivial

**Area of Concern**
Complexity, fate, triplets

</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
<title level="2">Devotee Benefits</title>

<column gap="tiny">

**[Divine Attribute](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=132)**
Intelligence or Wisdom

**Divine Font** [Harm](/Spells.aspx?ID=146) or [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148)

**Divine Sanctification** none

**Divine Skill** [Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=44)

**Favored Weapon** [Scythe](/Weapons.aspx?ID=394)

**Domains** [Fate](/Domains.aspx?ID=75), [Glyph](/Domains.aspx?ID=109), [Knowledge](/Domains.aspx?ID=80), [Truth](/Domains.aspx?ID=95)

**[Alternate Domains](/Rules.aspx?ID=802)** [Time](/Domains.aspx?ID=121)

**Cleric Spells**

- **1st**
[Anticipate Peril](/Spells.aspx?ID=2343)

- **3rd**
[Threefold Aspect](/Spells.aspx?ID=2038)

- **6th**
[Scrying](/Spells.aspx?ID=1662)

</column>
name: Magdh (The Three)
